comments.body: Love to share some tips, I would change the logo a bit to make it more "Modern" look at bitcoinwide. I would also change the font and try using bold fonts on titles. The current font looks a bit messy (could be my browser)Also, nobody wants to sign-in with their wallet on a brand-new service. It does not matter that you can't access it, bitcoin is meant to be private, so users don't even want to share their bitcoin address.I would also create an info page for each listing with additional information.

comments.author: BitGoba
comments.body: Most web platforms use social sign-in like facebook or tviter methods which severely compromise your privacy, or they use simple email/password combinations which are easy to forget. Lightning Authentication solves this problem by allowing you to authenticate without giving up any private informationLightning is a second layer payments network built on top of Bitcoin, designed for making faster and smaller payments. But Lightning isn’t just for payments. Everyone who uses it will have a unique identifying number, which won’t be connected to any personal information.Your unique Lightning ID is not tied to any personal information and can be used as Proof of Identity in platforms that support Lightning Authentication. This means that any individual can prove their identity using a Bitcoin/Lighting node without the need social media accounts, or even an email/password combination.
